mapper.select: SELECT e.empno, e.ename, e.job, e.mgr, e.hiredate, e.sal, e.comm, d.deptno, d.dname, d.loc FROM newdept d, newemp e WHERE d.deptno = e.deptno AND e.mgr IN (SELECT employee.mgr FROM newemp employee, newemp manager WHERE employee.mgr = manager.empno)
SELECT manager.empno, manager.ename FROM newemp employee, newemp manager WHERE employee.mgr = manager.empno GROUP BY manager.ename, manager.empno
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO newemp (empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno) VALUES (#{empno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{mgr}, #{hiredate}, #{sal}, #{comm}, #{deptno})
mapper.select: select count(*) from FROM newemp e, newdept d where d.deptno = e.deptno
